note.p: Daughter of John and Sarah Arkwright of Hope under Dinsmore, Herefordshire. Married Samuel Courthope Bosanquet in 1862. Died in France.
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 29 June 2021)
